p: Further details of model implementation, forcing, equilibration and verification can be found in Yool et al. ( 2013a, b, 2015) and Popova et al. ( 2010, 2014). The model shows good skill in reproducing main features of ocean dynamics and biogeochemistry, and in particular, an improvement in the representation of the main drives of the upper ocean biogeochemistry and ecosystems including upper ocean mixing and circulation.
